label: specifiedOrganizationalCertificate
comment: An organizational certificate specified for this facility production unit.
An organizational certificate specified for this logistics transport movement.
An organizational certificate specified for this production facility.
An organizational certificate specified for this production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.

domainIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
